title: GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills Now Available
contents: Status is everything, and in GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills you can now revel in your rightful position amongst the city's elite with a lavish new mansion property. Plus, cruise the streets in a fleet of new upscale vehicles that complement your new palace, disrupt plans for an autonomous surveillance state in a set of exciting new missions, or create your own adventures with the new Rockstar Mission Creator, and so much more. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/0ce50ee9bb7710275496bc923c24e70ead3d6885.jpg IMPECCABLE MANORS Prix Luxury Real Estate spared no expense on these modern architectural marvels, combining tasteful design and cutting-edge technology to elevate every touchpoint. Choose from three distinct locations in the most exclusive neighborhoods — each erected on a spacious plot with ample accommodations. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/a2d20abb8a8a853147b39bd2527a5e07af478dce.jpg NEW VEHICLES A Safehouse in the Hills introduces a slate of new top-of-the-line vehicles to GTA Online, including the futuristic new Pfister X-treme (Super), the throwback-inspired Übermacht Sentinel XS4 (Sedan), and the retro-styled Grotti GT750 (Sports Classic). {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/3b288aa49752d38ad82818e8ca28eacdac916802.jpg KNOWAY OUT Avi Schwartzman might be paranoid, but it looks like he’s genuinely onto something this time. Self-driving vehicle start-up KnoWay is using a fleet of autonomous SUVs to build a shadowy surveillance network. Help Avi put a stop to it by any means necessary in KnoWay Out. See full details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA Online's remarkable new mission creator feels like a glimpse at what's to come in GTA 6
contents: We still don't know exactly how GTA 6 will shake things up when it comes to the GTA Online experience, but we've had some early clues. The biggest is Rockstar's acquisition of FiveM, the biggest Grand Theft Auto roleplaying community - a bigger, more integrated focus on the RP side of things seems inevitable for the new game. The mission creator tool that just went live with the latest GTA Online update is yet another breadcrumb. This feels to me like the biggest, most public warm-up for GTA 6's multiplayer component so far, and you can start messing around with it right now. Read the rest of the story... contents: While Rockstar takes its time polishing GTA 6 into a neon sunbeam, one hobbyist modder has apparently decided to just make their own Grand Theft Multiverse instead. FV Mods, who evidently runs on a diet of caffeine and pure willpower, has now released a trilogy of giant map add-ons for GTA 5—effectively turning San Andreas into the world’s least coherent tourist atlas... Read more.

title: GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills Coming December 10
contents: Prime luxury real estate comes to GTA Online in A Safehouse in the Hills, the monumental new update arriving December 10. For those who have reached the highest rungs of the criminal ladder, celebrate your triumph with a painstakingly crafted palace in one of Los Santos’ most exclusive neighborhoods, complete with breathtaking views, the finest amenities, and countless ways to customize and make it your own. Plus, stop the development of a mass surveillance network in an all-new action packed adventure — along with exquisite new vehicles to collect, the return of a familiar face, and much more. See full details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Live A Superyacht Life with Lavish Rewards
contents: Float towards the horizon and chart a course for the next era of Los Santos luxury like a real mogul. Set sail in A Superyacht Life this week and be rewarded handsomely with 5X GTA$ and RP. Go to the bridge of your Galaxy Super Yacht or dial up Captain Darcy to get under way or begin your nautical adventures with a 40% discount on any Galaxy model at DockTease. Completing three A Superyacht Life Missions will accomplish the Weekly Challenge, landing you the Vibrant Check Smoking Jacket in addition to GTA$100,000. Speaking of moguls, Ray Trotman is posing as an art connoisseur after stealing a priceless piece from the San Andreas Gallery of Modern Art. Use a chopper, EMPs, and retinal scans to take it back, and get 4X GTA$ for completing The Fine Art File, this week’s FIB Priority File. Garment Factory owners can launch FIB Files using the Darnell Inc. app. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/a6a8e6020c8a76c976be99660df70e12bf4966be.jpg AQUARIUS UPGRADE Upgrade your buoyant home away from home. Current Orion or Pisces owners can graduate to the luxurious Aquarius Super Yacht, the most expensive and luxurious Galaxy model available, for a nominal fee of GTA$1. If you don’t own one yet, get in on the fun by taking GTA$2,000,000 off the price of the Aquarius, plus an additional 40% off on top of that, when shopping for Galaxy Super Yachts on the DockTease website. Any Upgrades and Modifications you make from there will also be 40% off. Seek out less fortunate vessels and locate Shipwrecks to collect 2X GTA$ and RP from all chests. SPECIAL BLACK FRIDAY DISCOUNTS Chase your holiday meal down with a veritable buffet of Black Friday desserts, including some of the highest discounts ever offered on select vehicles below, along with 50% off a portfolio of hot properties — available from November 27 through December 3: — Mammoth Avenger – 70% off — Benefactor Terrorbyte – 50% off — Mammoth F-160 Raiju (Plane) – 40% off — Imponte Deluxo (Sports Classic) – 40% off — And more See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Down on Luxury at The Diamond Casino & Resort
contents: For those looking to elevate their status to aid their quest for upcoming luxury real estate opportunities, the deck is stacked in your favor at The Diamond Casino & Resort this week. Claim a free Casino Master Penthouse to take advantage of The Diamond’s amenities, including Double Rewards on Casino Story and Casino Work Missions, plus get double daily Casino Chips. Anyone with an Arcade (30% off this week) can raid the vault for 2X Rewards in the Diamond Casino Heist Finale. Once you’ve mined those opportunities, there’s more to be made on the racetrack, with 2X GTA$ and RP on a new Community Race Series and 3X GTA$ and RP in the high stakes world of Open Wheel Races. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire

title: Lay a Proper Foundation in New Listings
contents: There's a new entrant in the Los Santos high-end real estate scene, and they're making moves into some of the most exclusive neighborhoods. Prix Luxury Real Estate has ambitious plans, bringing new unrivaled mansion properties to this lucrative market in December. As part of the consortium overseeing these new developments, Mr. Faber sees the opportunity to strengthen his own bottom line, and he knows just the right person to advance his plans. Clear out squatters, procure construction materials, and motivate contractors in New Listings — three new missions now available in GTA Online that bestow double GTA$ and RP. Help transform the face of Los Santos luxury real estate by completing all three, and you’ll be granted their preferred rate — a GTA$2,000,000 discount — when these properties hit the market in December. This week also brings executive bonuses to aid in the acquisition of capital resources, and look for additional opportunities throughout the month to take advantage of special bonuses and offers as you pursue your future palatial estate. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/becfabf2c4c15e7b153fb53d5c9042805e9ed046.jpg VERY IMPORTANT PRIX In preparation for their arrival on the Los Santos luxury property scene, Prix Luxury Real Estate is rolling out their new VIP program to welcome upwardly mobile homeowners into the elite. Complete all three New Listings missions by December 7 to ascend into the Gold Tier, rewarding you with a GTA$1,000,000 bonus (within 72 hours of completion), the Black Rockstar Varsity Crewneck, and a preferred rate (GTA$2,000,000 off) all Prix Luxury Real Estate listings arriving in December. Those who play GTA Online between November 13 and December 7 will qualify as a Black Tier VIP. Claim a FREE Übermacht Revolter (Sports) wrapped with the chic Sessanta Nove Monogram livery at the Luxury Autos showroom in Rockford Hills, and receive a collection of high-end fashion items befitting your elevated status. FREE EXECUTIVE OFFICE Don’t let perfectly good office space sit idle — put it to good use by claiming the Lombank West Executive Office for free this week. Become a wheeling-dealing, limousine-riding, jet-flying CEO with access to the SecuroServ network, VIP Work and Challenges, and more. Prefer another location? All other Executive Office Properties are 50% off, as are their Upgrades, Modifications, and Garage expansions through November 19. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

contents: Following yet another delay to Grand Theft Auto 6, CEO of Take Two Strauss Zelnick has casually mentioned one reason why his company's shareholders shouldn't be too worried: Grand Theft Auto 5, which obviously includes the massively successful GTA Online, has now sold over 220 million copies since its release in 2013... title: Celebrate Spooky Season as Halloween Haunts Los Santos
contents: Halloween descends on Southern San Andreas throughout October with a bubbling cauldron of chaos. There are reports of UFO sightings, bizarre transformations, and many more tricks and treats across GTA Online. Take on a new Slasher mode inside the claustrophobic Ramius submarine, or fight it out in returning favorites Beast vs. Slasher, Judgement Day, and Condemned. Halloween also brings boo-sted payouts and more in October, starting with 2X GTA$ and RP on Bunker Sell Missions and 30% off Bunkers and their Upgrades & Modifications this week. Get into the sinister spirit with free Halloween Masks and discounted spooky vehicles like the LCC Sanctus (Motorcycle) and Albany Lurcher (Muscle), the returning Albany Fränken Stange (Sports Classic) and Chariot Romero Hearse (Sedan), and more. Also, celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival in GTA Online. Play anytime through October 8 to get the Red Yeti Fall Cap and may your future be as bright as a full moon over Los Santos. ZOMBIE SURVIVALS RETURN There’s double trouble this month as Cayo Perico Survival and Ludendorff Cemetery Survival both return to GTA Online for a limited time, bringing tides of zombies to party-fueled paradise and snowy small town alike. Return to El Rubio’s island and North Yankton to tear through Waves of the undead, hulking juggernauts, armored conquistadors, splitters, possessed animals and their trainers, zombie DJs, and more. Cayo Perico Survival returns to pay out 2X GTA$ and RP from October 2–8, and Ludendorff Cemetery Survival will deal out Triple Rewards when it returns October 23–November 5. NEW RAMIUS SLASHER The latest twist on this Halloween classic puts you aboard the pitch-dark confines of the Ramius submarine. You’ll need to rely on your remaining senses to navigate multiple decks, survive combat at close quarters, and evade a watery grave. The Slasher begins each round armed with a Shotgun while the Hunted can use Flashlights to navigate the darkness. After three minutes, the Hunted get Shotguns and the stalker becomes the stalked. Fight it out beneath the waves in Slasher (Ramius Submarine) to earn 2X GTA$ and RP as part of the Featured Series from October 16–22. Previous Slasher modes also return to GTA Online throughout October. RETURNING HALLOWEEN FAVOURITES Slasher isn’t the only Adversary Mode making a grisly return. Each week in October, a different Halloween-themed mode will be included in the Featured Series with Double Rewards: October 2–8: Beast vs. Slasher October 9–15: Judgement Day October 16–22: Slasher (Ramius Submarine) October 23–29: Condemned October 30–November 5: Slasher (includes Ramius Submarine) There are plenty more off-kilter events across Los Santos throughout the month: look to the skies mid-month to spot UFOs hovering and abducting the unsuspecting, and help local investigators Ghosts Exposed by photographing evidence of the supernatural. Plus, collect Jack O’ Lanterns all month long to get bonus GTA$ and more. UNEARTH THE VINEWOOD UNDEAD COLLECTION Starting October 2, complete the first three weeks of Weekly Challenges this month to receive the Vinewood Undead Collection in time for Halloween — a bundle of rewards consisting of the new Slasher Clown Outfit, the rare Please Stop Me Mask, Vinewood Zombie Tee, and the all-over Skulls livery for the Mammoth Avenger. For an added treat, all Weekly Challenges this month also reward double the usual GTA$ and include collectible Halloween Masks. October 2–8: Survive two Waves in a Survival without dying to earn GTA$200,000 and the Brown Vintage Zombie Mask (required to unlock the Vinewood Undead Collection). October 9–15: Complete three Taxi Fares to claim GTA$200,000 and the Weathered Vintage Mummy Mask (required to unlock the Vinewood Undead Collection). October 16–22: Win one Adversary Mode to earn GTA$200,000 and the Brown Vintage Werewolf Mask (required to unlock the Vinewood Undead Collection). October 23–29: Survive four Waves in a Survival without dying to earn GTA$200,000 and the Gray Jumping Spider Mask. October 30–November 5: Win one Adversary Mode to earn GTA$200,000 and the Gray Hooded Skull Mask. HALLOWEEN COMMUNITY SERIES The Community Series is getting in on the frightful antics this month too, featuring new Jobs each week, including costumed Deathmatches, haunted racetracks by shervera1980 and Trixx74 strewn with pumpkins and coffins, and a gargantuan course designed by the talented Mr_Kevson.

title: Secure the New Spy Shots Livery for the Överflöd Suzume
contents: Speed into the mainframe behind the wheel of the Överflöd Suzume, a Scandinavian supercar featured in the Money Fronts update that’s on sale for the first time ever this week (20% off) and wrapped in the new Spy Shots livery. title: 'The future of GTA roleplaying' announced in collaboration with Rockstar Games
contents: Back in August 2023, Rockstar Games acquired the team and tech behind FiveM, a Grand Theft Auto Online mod it had previously tried to shut down. FiveM enables the use of custom cars, maps, and weapons among other content, but crucially also allows for a much bigger player count in online games. Together, these capabilities made it a key piece of software for GTA Online's roleplay (RP) community... Read more.

title: The Neighborhood Watch Event Continues: Get the Winter LSPD Officer Uniform and More
contents: The Neighborhood Watch Event enters its second week with an opportunity to unlock another LSPD uniform. Engage in off-the-books Dispatch Work for Vincent with any eligible Law Enforcement Vehicle, and earn 2X GTA$ and RP all week long. Complete three Dispatch Work assignments to satisfy the Neighborhood Watch Event Weekly Challenge and get the Winter LSPD Officer w/ Tie Outfit in addition to a GTA$100,000 prize. Meet up with Vincent once you’ve completed the Slush Fund mission in The Cluckin’ Bell Farm Raid to unlock a Law Enforcement Vehicle. Once inside an eligible vehicle, you can request Dispatch Work or accept Vincent’s invitation to get cracking. You’ll also need to relinquish your CEO, VIP, or MC President status to maintain a low profile while working undercover. contents: Officer Vincent Effenburger and the citizens of the Greater Los Santos area are counting on you to stem the tide of LSPD corruption. By doing so you can add a flashy new police outfit to your repertoire. To aid in your citizen policing efforts, Warstock Cache & Carry is slashing prices on all decommissioned Law Enforcement Vehicles. Next week, you’ll have the opportunity to unlock an additional uniform — stay tuned for details. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/132813e7b00cd3bd89b1e27b3b0cacc5320c2f16.jpg ALL LAW ENFORCEMENT VEHICLES ON SALE In addition to completing the first mission for The Cluckin’ Bell Farm Raid, you’ll need to own a decommissioned Law Enforcement Vehicle for Dispatch Work. Luckily, Warstock Cache & Carry is running a fire sale for the next two weeks. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Up with 2X GTA$ and RP on Cayo Perico Survival This Week
contents: Cayo Perico is overrun with all manner of undead threats. It’s unclear if the scourge stems from a batch of bad party favors or an ancient curse, but one thing’s clear: they’re out for blood. Mow them down to enable your escape via the landing zone, or take on endless Waves and see how long you can last while reaping 2X GTA$ and RP on Cayo Perico Survival through September 10. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/50028a730df76229e51afd5c3703f794cb76b417.jpg CAYO PERICO SURVIVAL BONUS REWARDS Get the I Survived Cayo Perico Tee for playing the new mode (delivered within 72 hours of playing), and vanquish all ten Waves of any Survival this week to collect The Buccaneer Outfit and GTA$100,000 for completing the Weekly Challenge. Struggling to reach Wave 10? Try these tips: - Regular Zombies will speed up if a DJ is playing music. Take out the DJs to slow down the onslaught. - Don’t get overrun. Coordinate with teammates to take out both halves of a Splitter in double time. - Conquistadors are only vulnerable to melee attacks, and their Muskets take a long time to reload. Get up close and handle them quickly. - Follow the Undead Panther Trainer’s red trail and take them out quickly, otherwise you’ll need to keep fighting off lethal attacks from big cats. Beyond that, remember to use space to your advantage, stock up on Snacks before you ship out, and don’t be afraid to fire away — any ammunition you use during Survivals will be restocked. Speaking of big cats, rep local wildlife by playing GTA Online anytime this week to receive the Panther Tour Jacket, free of charge. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

contents: GTA 6 may be drawing closer and closer, but GTA Online is still going strong with new missions, cars and activities hitting the streets of Los Santos on a regular basis. 2025 has been a great year for GTA Online, but there are even more events, modes, and leaked DLC updates to look forward to in the coming months... title: Battle Hordes of Undead in the New Cayo Perico Survival
contents: Your favorite island paradise just came down with a deadly case of party fever. As if a major narcotrafficking island wasn’t dangerous enough, it’s now been overrun by the undead — and maybe it’s the drugs or the tropical climate, but this time they’ve got a whole lot weirder. Cut your way through waves of undead, including conquistadors armed with muskets, Panther Trainers and their feral pets, swarms of Splitters, and more in the new Cayo Perico Survival. Fight through these hordes and make your way to the airstrip — then pray your evacuation plane doesn’t take too long. Welcome to the tourist trap. 2X REWARDS ON CAYO PERICO SURVIVAL Get 2X GTA$ and RP in the new Cayo Perico Survival through September 10. Equip an arsenal and join the fracas by launching the Cayo Perico Series from your in-game phone or heading to the palm tree corona down in Terminal. GET THE I SURVIVED CAYO PERICO TEE AND MORE Even if you can’t make it past the initial wave, everyone gets a souvenir in the form of the I Survived Cayo Perico Tee just for braving these reanimated ravers (delivered within 72 hours of playing). Pirates abide by a code — no prey, no pay. You can earn The Buccaneer Outfit plus GTA$100,000 in loot by completing all ten waves of a Survival through September 10. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Drift Week Slides into GTA Online with a Free Vehicle and Street-Ready Upgrades
contents: Los Santos power slides into Drift Week with panache. Claim a brand-new drift vehicle for free and open up a world of corner-hugging precision with Drift Tuning Upgrades on four more rides. Plus, earn race rewards along with doubled payouts across some of Los Santos’ most intense showdowns. The Drift Tuning Upgrade is now available for the Bravado Gauntlet Hellfire (Muscle), Annis Hardy (Sedan), Vapid Dominator FX (Muscle, 50% off), and Dinka Chavos V6 (Sedan, 50% off) by visiting Hao’s Special Works inside the Los Santos Car Meet. All four of these vehicles are currently on display in the Premium Deluxe Motorsport showroom — visit Simeon’s outpost to browse, test, and purchase them on the spot. Plus, both the Vapid Dominator FX and Dinka Chavos V6 are available at 50% off this week, making it the perfect time to upgrade your lineup and dial in that perfect drift build. CLAIM A FREE DECLASSE DRIFT WALTON L35 FOR A LIMITED-TIME The Declasse Drift Walton L35 (Off-Road) is a reimagining of the classic pickup for the drift scene. It boasts an aggressive stance, street style, and a full slate of customization upgrades to match. Claim it for free from the Southern San Andreas Super Autos website or get it from Premium Deluxe Motorsport’s showroom with only a small upcharge for some select modifications. But hurry, this special edition leaves the lot on August 27, so grab it now and turn every on-ramp into a playground. MORE EVENTS TO COME INCLUDING A GTA$ GIVEAWAY In addition to a free vehicle, look out for a cavalcade of events in GTA Online throughout the remaining summer weeks and into the fall — including a new Survival mode, ghastly Halloween occurrences, and a GTA$1M cash giveaway beginning next week. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Ex GTA and Red Dead producer Dan Houser's open-world game has a new publisher
contents: From the very early days of the studio through to GTA 5 and Red Dead Redemption 2, Dan Houser's name has been synonymous with Rockstar, which he co-founded alongside brother Sam and several other collaborators. He left the developer in 2020, and while it's been working to bring us Grand Theft Auto 6, Houser has formed Absurd Ventures. His new team has been creating everything from podcasts to novels, several of which take place in a sci-fi universe called A Better Paradise. Now, its untitled, upcoming open-world game has been signed by publisher Smilegate, best known for online games Lost Ark and Crossfire. Read the rest of the story... title: GTA Online may add age verification ahead of GTA 6, Rockstar leaker claims
contents: Of all the live-service games to make waves over the past decade and a half, it feels like GTA Online often flies under the radar. The likes of Fortnite, Call of Duty, and MMOs like Final Fantasy 14 are all constantly hitting the headlines while Grand Theft Auto's online mode quietly chugs away in the background. It's made the wait for GTA 6 more bearable, that's for sure. GTA Online has a dedicated playerbase who regularly log onto their servers to roleplay, fight, or perform Hamlet together. However, it appears that Rockstar is soon going to implement an age verification check to the hugely popular online game. Read the rest of the story... title: Cayo Perico Motor Wars: New Mode with 2X Rewards
contents: The lush, sprawling grounds of El Rubio’s private island are now a chaotic new battleground in Cayo Perico Motor Wars, a tropical twist on the classic mode that’s dealing out 2X GTA$ and RP for the next two weeks. Drop into one of six fast-shrinking areas that force you into a fight, then survive and dominate to take the win. Whether you take to the skies, control the roads, or stalk the underbrush, supremacy is the only goal. Expect an arsenal of weapons, vehicles, and shifting tactical opportunities — so stay light on your feet. Launch this new Adversary Mode by joining the Cayo Perico Series. Pull up your iFruit and use Quick Join, or head over to the blip on your map in Terminal. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/9362141a30960cd7858a106f594c0093c232695c.jpg GET THE GOLD GUN NECKLACE Survive by completing a session of Cayo Perico Motor Wars to receive the Gold Gun Necklace as a stylish souvenir, delivered within 72 hours of completion. Plus, make three Safeguard deliveries to complete the Weekly Challenge and earn a cool GTA$100,000 bonus. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: It took 12 years, but Grand Theft Auto 5 is now legal in Saudi Arabia
contents: 12 years after its original release on the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, Grand Theft Auto 5 is now legal to purchase and own in Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates. The game was given a surprise 21+ rating in June by Saudi Arabia's General Authority for Media Regulation and the UAE Media Council, and officially released in both countries today... Read more.

title: Solve Dilemmas for Mr. Faber’s Clients and Get Double Rewards
contents: The evasive puppeteer behind Southern San Andreas' money laundering syndicate requires your assistance. Locate lost valuables, sabotage enemy outfits, and more in Mr. Faber Work — in exchange for 2X GTA$ and RP. Plus, additionally compensate yourself with a GTA$100,000 bonus for completing five Mr. Faber Work Missions to fulfill the Weekly Challenge. Completing Mr. Faber Work will increase Heat at the business front it’s launched from. If it reaches the maximum, your passive income will stall. Doing legal work — washing vehicles at the Hands On Car Wash, making deliveries for Smoke on the Water, or chauffeuring tourists at Higgins Helitours — will get things humming again. Start GTA Online: Money Fronts by answering Martin Madrazo’s call to meet Mr. Faber at LSIA and use the For Sale sign outside the Hands On Car Wash to purchase your first Money Laundering operation. Once you’re set up, you can launch Money Laundering Missions or legal work from anywhere by calling up Raf. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/61f5d6903ec488744a9ab507abcafe82c633c76b.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON TIME TRIALS Vying against other racers is a challenge, but there's something particularly nerve-racking when the opponent is a ticking clock. Compete in Time Trials to set personal bests, aim for track records, and earn Double Rewards through July 23. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON G’S CACHE Pick up G’s Cache daily dead drops and reap Double Rewards through July 23. When one is close by, look for a red flashing light and listen for a beeping sound. Activating the Bureau Tech collectible scanner upgrade for the Terrorbyte will also reveal its location when nearby. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: All GTA Online Smoke on the Water product locations and rewards
contents: Smoke on the Water is a small business that you can buy for your money laundering operation in Grand Theft Auto Online, but unlike the other Money Fronts businesses, this one adds a new set of daily collectibles to the map... Read more.

title: All Mr Faber Work bonus objectives in GTA Online
contents: Grand Theft Auto Online's Money Fronts update introduces money laundering businesses into the game, but there are also six new missions that can be completed for Mr. Faber that don't involve boring tasks like washing cars. Each of these missions has secret bonus objectives that aren't marked on the map, and you'll get some extra cash for a job well done if you take care of them... Read more.

title: How to complete Safeguard Deliveries in GTA Online
contents: Rockstar Games has quietly been adding side missions to Grand Theft Auto Online in between major content updates, and Safeguard Deliveries are the latest non-criminal job opportunity that you can take advantage of to earn some extra cash on the side... Read more.

title: Double Rewards for Smoke on the Water Money Laundering Missions
contents: Sabotage your dispensary’s competition at the root in Smoke on the Water Money Laundering Missions, dishing out Double Rewards through July 16. Intercept NOOSE raids, frame enemy gangs for hits on rival dealers, collect canisters of cash, and more. If you’re just entering the world of Money Fronts, start by acquiring the Hands On Car Wash from Maze Bank Foreclosures and you can expand your new money laundering business from there to add Smoke on the Water — along with Higgins Helitours — via the laptop in the office (or via Maze Bank Foreclosures once the Hands On Car Wash is purchased). Smoke on the Water also generates a boost on earnings from Weed Farm Sell Missions, so take advantage this week by growing your criminal business portfolio with 30% off Weed Farms. Plus, extra passive income from your existing network (Arcades, Biker Businesses, Bunkers, etc.) will be routed to the safe at the Hands On Car Wash. The more existing enterprises you own, the more bonus income is generated! Completing any three Smoke on the Water missions, including legal delivery work, will satisfy the latest Weekly Challenge and land you a GTA$100,000 bonus. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/d5ee7d0832350358cc44238215e974b0d411fd74.jpg 2X PRODUCTION SPEEDS ON BIKER WEED FARM AND NIGHTCLUB ORGANIC PRODUCE STOCK Something’s gotten into the crops around Los Santos, spurring them to grow twice as quick, resulting in 2X Production Speeds for both Biker Weed Farm Stock and Organic Produce in Nightclubs. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Embrace the Freedom of the Open Road in GTA Online This Independence Day Weekend
contents: This week’s GTA Online festivities put the spotlight on America's vibrant car culture and appetite for rebellion with 4X GTA$ and RP on Land Races, Double Rewards on Auto Shop Client Jobs and Tow Truck Services, and a new Independence Day livery for the Declasse Walton L35 Stock (Off-Road). {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/65894876b3b2dc024a920a450b1761b7507a04fc.jpg INDEPENDENCE DAY DISCOUNTS Roll into the holiday weekend with savings on vehicles, properties, and more star-spangled items. Get 40% off the Western Sovereign (Motorcycle) and Vapid Liberator (Off-Road) — two American-made icons built for tearing up asphalt and dirt. Benny’s Original Motor Works is offering 40% off all Conversion Upgrades, perfect for testing the limits of street legal requirements. Meanwhile, serve the skies with military precision with 50% off the JoBuilt P-996 LAZER (Plane), and celebrate with a bang by picking up the Musket and Firework Launcher for 50% off at the Gun Van. Stock up with Free Firework Launcher Ammo, also available at the Gun Van and Ammu-Nation. Expand your criminal empire with 30% off Bunkers, Nightclubs, Cocaine Lockups, and Salvage Yard Properties. Plus, take advantage of 40% off a collection of holiday-ready gear and liveries, accessories and apparel. BEER HATS AND MORE IN BUSINESS BATTLE CRATES Beer may not be an American invention, but the Beer Hat certainly is. Look for the Pißwasser, Benedict, Patriot, and Supa Wet Beer Hats in Business Battle Crates, along with the festive Statue of Happiness T-Shirt. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: The Överflöd Suzume Supercar and New Safeguard Deliveries Now in GTA Online
contents: The Överflöd Suzume (Super) spent most of its life shrouded in secrecy. First as a classified sketch, then as a super-limited concept car, and now it’s finally unleashed upon the general populace in all its glory. Join the vanguard by purchasing one from Legendary Motorsport. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/ba6ebf84ed2a32b3b7ddcb780946bde985e8c473.jpg COLLECT MORE NEW VEHICLES GTA Online: Money Fronts features a collection of new vehicles to acquire, with a number of them debuting today in dealerships across Southern San Andreas. Nimbly outmaneuver adversaries in the Annis Minimus (Sedan), get low with the Declasse Walton L35 Stock (Off-Road), or become the final boss of mid-life crises with the Declasse Tampa GT (Muscle). INTRODUCING THE GROTTI LSCM CHEETAH CLASSIC Car collectors with exquisite taste can also get behind the wheel of the Grotti LSCM Cheetah Classic (Sports Classic) — a uniquely styled version of the two-door coupe devised by the Los Santos Car Meet customizing collective that also includes a pre-installed Missile Lock-On Jammer. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: How to maximize Money Fronts profits in GTA Online
contents: GTA Online's Money Fronts update may not seem as exciting as the other criminal activities available in Los Santos, but money laundering is actually now one of the best ways to add some extra digits to your bank account without much effort... Read more.

title: GTA Online: Money Fronts
contents: Channel new revenue streams of clean and dirty income through iconic local businesses in Money Fronts, today’s new update in GTA Online. From the frenzied clubs of Tony Prince to El Rubio’s narcotrafficking empire, the power of Epsilon to the gold-tinted hijinks of Yusuf Amir — they’re all sustained by one thing: dirty filthy money. And you’ve just been summoned by the man who oversees it all. The head of San Andreas’ biggest money laundering network of shadowy financiers — the elusive Mr. Faber — has heard about you. And with the help of Martin Madrazo and Faber's fashionable fixer, Raf De Angelis, it's time for you two to form a mutually beneficial connection. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/370cb951b935d402ca4b28485c3841769d3e0d9d.jpg GET HANDS ON Start scrubbing your criminal network’s bottom line at the Hands On Car Wash, the perfect above-board establishment to run cover for a criminal conspiracy. Dirty money flows in from all manner of back channels as you disrupt and destroy rival operations, bolster earnings from your already established unlawful endeavors, and watch the squeaky-clean cash flow out. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/1ea89e2776ded3a9fea8ecde12e73707d4faf519.jpg SMOKE ON THE WATER Once you purchase the Hands On Car Wash, you can also expand your portfolio to include Smoke on the Water. Owning Vespucci Beach’s premier stash spot allows you to launder more money and run interference on rival grow operations. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/ee3970920f5fd888c9af77f06e499d2ad8c631d7.jpg HIGGINS HELITOURS Owning the Hands On Car Wash also opens up the ability to take over Higgins Helitours on the Vespucci Helipad. Use the business’ equipment to give tourists a bird’s-eye view of Los Santos out front while hauling valuable cargo and taking down smugglers out back — cutting into your competitors’ supply. In addition to legitimate business operations, each of the above also hides less-than-legal Money Laundering activities behind the scenes, utilizing each front’s strengths and resources to support your empire’s financial health. Calling up Raf or using the laptop inside your fronts can launch unique Money Laundering missions — those launched from the Hands On Car Wash will pay out 2X GTA$ and RP this week, and other businesses will be receiving boosts in the weeks ahead. Earnings from these laundering ops are stored in the Duffel Bag in your Car Wash’s bedroom. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/ae336d050b5666e38c06f5f420267cf682a984d6.jpg IT'S ALL CONNECTED Getting into the laundering game benefits your existing criminal network, with extra income from your other established businesses funneling into your front operation, delivering the cash to the Car Wash safe. Owning the Car Wash also boosts all Counterfeit Cash Factory Sales from your MC business (30% off this week), while Smoke on the Water provides a bump to all Weed Farm Sales. Operating Higgins Helitours as a front results in a lift for all Air Freight Cargo. Money Laundering Missions raise suspicion from the authorities in the form of Heat on your various fronts. Businesses with Heat will be blipped with caution signals on the map and require you to cool things back down via legal activity before generating further passive income. Clean up customer vehicles at the Car Wash, then return them to the client for a cash payment. Delivering bales of organic product from Smoke on the Water and conducting landmark tours with the Higgins company Maverick also lowers any Heat that builds up on those respective ventures while also providing a payout. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/cc5db058436dc9465ddcd0a94e7290b26c7fc9c3.jpg MR. FABER WORK Professional money laundering services are in high demand, and Mr. Faber’s clients are not patient people. Lend your problem-solving expertise to the man behind the scenes and help his other clients in Mr. Faber Work by recovering stolen assets, escorting valuable cargo, and dealing with rival outfits. Use the laptop inside any of your Money Laundering Businesses — or call Raf directly — to assist with Mr. Faber Work for GTA$ and RP rewards, plus an added bonus once it’s been scrubbed of any traces of its shady origins. Completing Mr. Faber Work raises the Heat on the associated business it’s launched from, so remember to keep up appearances with legal activities to keep the funds rolling in uninterrupted. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45517848/30161f83ad7424369fe3fb1541c650bff9053cda.jpg Money Fronts introduces six new vehicles, including the Överflöd Suzume. Bring the rustic vibes of Paleto Forest wherever you go with the Karin Woodlander SUV. The Karin Everon RS SUV takes the big ego energy of the previous Everon model and amplifies it to a level as obnoxious as the guy blasting reactionary country music on Vespucci Beach. Plus, there’s the super responsive Dewbauchee Rapid GT X sports car, the new Annis Hardy sedan, and more to come. A vast number of vehicles are also returning to showrooms and websites with Missile Lock-On Jammer capabi...

title: GTA Online update hints that a long-requested feature may arrive before GTA 6
contents: Sure, GTA 5 and GTA Online have been with us for years now, with dozens of big updates adding new features and content to the Los Santos sandbox. However, there are still some highly-requested things that Rockstar hasn't got around to implementing. One such feature is mansions - while lavish penthouse apartments are all well and good, players have long wanted massive, decadent homes to symbolize the millions (or sometimes billions) of dollars they've accrued over the years. Well, today's latest major update to GTA Online may be teasing the addition of mansions, hopefully just in the nick of time before GTA 6 arrives. Read the rest of the story... title: GTA Online's next update will let you pull off a classic, if slightly dull, type of crime: money laundering
contents: I feel like money laundering is one of those concepts you see in a lot of crime TV shows but it's not really something that seems to come up much in games. I certainly can't think of any games that feature money laundering as an actual mechanic, but I'll be able to add one to the list next week: GTA Online. The multiplayer game is getting a new update this coming June 17th called Money Fronts, and is literally all about buying up small but generally lucrative businesses that you can sneak some money through. Read more

title: GTA Online's Money Fronts update is basically Breaking Bad minus the meth
contents: GTA Online's next major update is called Money Fronts, and it introduces a trio of new businesses that players can use to butter up their bottom line with some extra passive income... Read more.

title: GTA Online: Money Fronts Coming June 17
contents: Take control of San Andreas’ biggest money laundering operation and clean up your criminal empire’s bottom line in Money Fronts — the latest GTA Online update arriving on June 17. Acquire iconic local businesses and use them to route earnings through a sophisticated and interconnected operation while hiding it from prying eyes. With the help of longstanding associate Martin Madrazo, you’ll connect with new advisors who will help you accumulate new business ventures and launder your dirty money while also infusing your accounts with legitimate income. With some creative bookkeeping and a little elbow grease, you’ll end up further enriched and the taxman will be none the wiser. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Hit the Jackpot Inside The Diamond Casino & Resort’s Vault
contents: Few places are more comforting in perilous times than The Diamond Casino & Resort — the crown jewel of the Los Santos entertainment scene. Besides the extra oxygen pumped into the HVAC system, The Diamond offers benefits and amenities to Master Penthouse owners and those who rescue the Casino and its staff from criminal schemes. On the other hand, there’s a jackpot waiting for you in the vault if you’re the one plotting and betting on its downfall. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/0126d811a4af2a81f394d5a053f0a91d13f3d4b2.jpg GUARANTEED DIAMONDS Once you’ve set up your base of operations underneath your Arcade, you can begin to plan The Diamond Casino Heist where you’ll break into and out of the casino vault — it’s guaranteed to contain Diamonds through June 16. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Climb the Corporate Ladder in GTA Online with Executive Bonuses
contents: Savvy Executives and their trusted Associates are primed for a surge in profits this week as demand skyrockets for Mixed Goods and Special Vehicle Work. There’s serious money to be made by moving fast — sell GTA$300,000 worth of product across all business holdings to complete the Weekly Challenge and land a GTA$100,000 bonus. This is also the perfect time to level up operations by taking 30% off Executive Offices, Special Cargo Warehouses, and a trio of CEO-tier Buckingham aircraft. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/029eaeeb2dd5cb97b54d0b66d69a5178299ac58c.jpg 3X GTA$ AND RP ON SPECIAL VEHICLE WORK Access the SecuroServ Network on the computer inside your Executive Office to launch a lucrative rampage in Special Vehicle Work — fighting off hacking attacks, exfiltrating client VIPs, and seizing assets, all while earning 3X GTA$ and RP through June 4. 2X GTA$ AND RP FOR EXPORTING MIXED GOODS Dodge criminals and cops alike as you transport in-demand cargo to the docks in Export Mixed Goods Missions in exchange for Double Rewards. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: 'According to Steam, I have around 10,000 hours logged,' says the modder who's spent a decade turning GTA 5 into a photo realistic wonderland
contents: When those first bars of Tom Petty's Love Is a Long Road rang out against a sun-kissed cityscape in late December 2023, the world changed for GTA 6 anticipators. For those keen and waiting fans, the first trailer for the next long-awaited entry in Rockstar's crime simulator series offered a glimpse of what lay ahead. Finally, it was real, thereafter fueling reams of speculation about its characters, its setting, its mission structure and its inevitable deluge of unscrupulous side quests that will define our return to Vice City... Read more.

title: Profits Hit High Tide with Double Rewards on A Superyacht Life
contents: Seek adventure on the high seas and plunder Double Rewards all this week. Salvage sunken cargo, capsize enemy vessels, and fight off amphibious assaults in A Superyacht Life Contact Missions, paying out 2X GTA$ and RP through May 28. Plus, complete three A Superyacht Life Missions to fulfill the Weekly Challenge and claim GTA$100,000. Visit Captain Darcy on the bridge of your Galaxy Super Yacht (40% off this week) to get started. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/3a74f6024750b3ff8f140d3639e15e72ffc01493.jpg DOUBLE REWARDS ON SHIPWRECKS Comb the beaches, piers, and jetties around Southern San Andreas and you’ll earn 2X GTA$ and RP for locating daily Shipwrecks containing treasure. Pick up Outfit Scraps to unlock The Frontier Outfit as a reward. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Engage in Disruption to Earn Double on All FIB Files Finales
contents: Once you move into the Darnell Bros Garment Factory, get acquainted with Jodi Marshall and install the Darnell Inc. app on your iFruit, you can embark on the clandestine operations of The FIB Files. In addition to gunplay and evasive maneuvers, these multi-part operations require mastery of hacking, infiltration, and disruption. Putting these skills to good use will pay off since all FIB Files Finales — The Brute Force File, The Black Box File, The Fine Art File, and The Project Breakaway File — are paying out 2X GTA$ and RP this week. This boost also applies to this week’s Priority File (The Fine Art File). Playing with a crew makes it easier to grab items faster and prevents burdening one with carrying too much loot. All the FIB Files Finales feature three Elite Challenges that can be completed for extra GTA$, including an additional bonus for completing all three. Complete any three FIB Files Finales to fulfill the latest Weekly Challenge, and get a GTA$100,000 bonus. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/c59276fa9deb111c454bd4e72d6e625476216c6e.jpg DOUBLED PASSIVE INCOME FROM THE GARMENT FACTORY Aside from serving as the nerve center of your Agents of Sabotage operations, the Darnell Bros Garment Factory (30% off this week) will also bring in doubled Passive Income through May 21, which you can claim from the Wall Safe upstairs. MERRYWEATHER SECURITY LIVERY FOR THE DH-7 IRON MULE Successfully completing The Titan Job from Oscar Guzman Flies Again anytime through May 21 will reward you with the limited-time Merryweather Security livery for the Buckingham DH-7 Iron Mule (Helicopter), delivered within 72 hours of completion. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Secure the Bag with Bonuses on The Contract
contents: Being an elite celebrity fixer means doing whatever it takes — especially when a celebrity of Dr. Dre’s caliber calls. Recover Dre’s stolen phone loaded with unreleased tracks and sensitive intel in The Data Leaks and score a bonus by wrapping up his saga in the final mission. Join forces with the crew at F. Clinton & Partner to earn Double Rewards on Security Contracts. Those yet to launch their own operation can take 30% off Agency Properties and their Upgrades and Modifications, including the Vehicle Workshop and Imani Tech Upgrades. Step into Franklin and Lamar’s shoes in Double Down, explore brand-new Community Series Jobs, and pick up a free RPG at the Gun Van — all in homage to The Contract — through May 14. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/6978c6b49f15d3b30fe06c03c1baf8e8cf8f03cf.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON THE DATA LEAKS Track down Dr. Dre’s stolen phone and exact revenge in The Data Leaks, now awarding 2X GTA$ and RP. Completing the finale will also satisfy the Weekly Challenge and net you an extra GTA$100,000. Swing by Luxury Autos to see the Declasse Granger 3600LX (SUV) in a calmer light — now 30% off. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON SECURITY CONTRACTS Whether you’re taking out rival gangs or rescuing high-profile clients, it’s all in a day’s work for Los Santos’ elite fixers. Use the computer in your Agency to dive into Security Contracts for Double Rewards. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Grand Theft Auto 5 is Rockstar's worst game, but GTA 6 makes me optimistic again
contents: Beginning in 1997, Grand Theft Auto has been a platform for Rockstar to expound its version of satire. The cast of the original GTA is a nihilistic rogue's gallery of corrupt cops and seedy politicians. The poster that comes in the game's box says it was co-developed by 'The Hand of Satan,' marking the first of many middle fingers that Rockstar has raised to good taste. But in Grand Theft Auto 4, and protagonist Niko Bellic, Rockstar becomes more sympathetic, more humanist. Read the rest of the story... title: Drivers Thrive with 4X GTA$ and RP on Open Wheel Races
contents: High speeds, outlandish production budgets, corporate sponsors, interpersonal drama — it’s hard to compete with the spectacle of Open Wheel Races. The circuit also promises an eye-popping 4X GTA$ and RP on the seven fan-favorite tracks returning to the Featured Series this week. Head over to Legion Square to compete. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/d916fa677986954bdfd1cb1303baf0c7a2cb8187.jpg 40% OFF OPEN WHEEL RACE CARS Get in prime overtake position with a custom Open Wheel race car. GET THE DARK MANOR SUIT Completing three Open Wheel Races this week will reward you with the Dark Manor Suit — available within 72 hours of completion. 2X GTA$ AND RP ON PAYPHONE HITS Due to ongoing FIB monitoring operations, the nature of Payphone Hits is best kept off the record. Executing wet-work operations against high-value targets is high-risk and high-reward, so you’ll be paid out 2X GTA$ and RP for completing them. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Rewards on Terrorbyte Client Jobs and Mobile Operations Missions
contents: Paige Harris is calling on skilled operators to take on Terrorbyte Client Jobs for a lucrative 2X GTA$ and RP through April 30. Owners of the Benefactor Terrorbyte can launch these high-stakes missions directly from the touchscreen terminal inside. If you haven’t already, you can get a hold of this high-tech beast at Warstock Cache & Carry. Complete three Terrorbyte Client Jobs to conquer the Weekly Challenge and score an extra GTA$100,000. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/90472331383f1c77c22a7b53c1226a2042bb739e.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON MOBILE OPERATIONS MISSIONS Lead strategic Mobile Operations Missions from your customized command center and execute precision strikes or intercept enemy convoys to earn 2X GTA$ and RP. For Bunker owners looking to expand their arsenal, the Mobile Operations Center, along with all its Upgrades and Modifications, is 30% off through April 30. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Smoke Lamar in the New Hunting Pack Remix
contents: Lamar Davis is in big trouble again. In this new take on Hunting Pack, the LD Organics van is on fire — clouding Lamar’s mind and vision — while a rival gang is in hot pursuit. Join Lamar and the Grove Street Families to shepherd the product to its final destination, or team up with the Ballas and Vagos to bring the delivery to a screeching halt. Play Hunting Pack (Get Lamar) through April 23 to earn 2X GTA$ and RP. Winning two rounds of Hunting Pack (Get Lamar) will also complete the Weekly Challenge and get you the Black High Brass Tee in addition to GTA$100,000. Get involved by heading over to the Featured Series in Chamberlain Hills, and celebrate 4/20 all week long in GTA Online with themed in-game apparel, bonuses on Weed Product Sell Missions, Street Dealer Sales, and more. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/fb4decc58605af5c0fffd78a41b19888ce63859f.jpg 4/20 FITS Dress in the latest high fashion — log in and play GTA Online this week to receive the Gold 420 Pendant, Green 420 Festival Outfit and Yeti Earth Day Hoodie. Round out your 4/20 collection by completing any Biker Business Sell Mission this week to receive the Güffy Drug Rug Hoodie. 3X GTA$ ON WEED FARM SELL MISSIONS No matter how hard they try, decriminalization and legalization could never kill the black market. Pick your poison and feed the streets potent contraband of your own creation by offloading stock in Weed Farm Sell Missions and you’ll reap 3X GTA$. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Double Rewards on GTA Online’s Classic Heists
contents: Los Santos is a hustler’s paradise with countless avenues to riches — but few schemes top the thrills of the OG Heists. Crack The Fleeca Job, bust a mad professor out in The Prison Break, secure intel in The Humane Labs Raid, move contraband in Series A Funding, and take on The Pacific Standard Job for 2X GTA$ and RP this week. Completing any two Heist Finales this week will fulfill the Weekly Challenge and get you an additional bonus of GTA$100,000. If you’re looking to kickstart your heisting career, you’ll need a High-End Apartment complete with the necessary planning room — get one at 30% off this week from the Dynasty 8 website. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/c8d952b569ae34a65faca38fd44cd377f3130417.jpg 2X GTA$ AND RP ON PIZZA DELIVERY If preparation and teamwork aren't really your thing, and satiating the city's hungry masses is more your calling, get 2X GTA$ and RP on Pizza Delivery. Visit any of the three Pizza This… locations in Los Santos to get started. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA 5 Enhanced is making its way to PC Game Pass soon
contents: There's still no sign of GTA 6 PC, but Rockstar hasn't completely forgotten about the computer crowd. title: GTA Online: Oscar Guzman Flies Again Now Available
contents: Reconnect with a notorious arms trafficker to rip off opposing gangs and challenge a multinational military industrial corporation in Oscar Guzman Flies Again, now available in GTA Online. Take over the historic McKenzie Field Hangar in Grapeseed and combine an aviator’s flair with cutting-edge tech to go up against Eberhard Munitions, steal goods in new Arms Trafficking missions, and much more. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/b61b4aa02e55eb04fc69003eaa7be1253f422395.jpg PREPARE FOR TAKEOFF Inherit Trevor Philips’ legacy as Blaine County’s most infamous smuggler by purchasing the McKenzie Field Hangar, available on Maze Bank Foreclosures’ in-game website or by using the For Sale sign out front of the property in Grapeseed. Your purchase comes with a Duster plane and an unlockable Western Duster 300-H prop plane to sweeten the deal and get you airborne ASAP. Beyond serving as the command post of Oscar Guzman’s comeback, the McKenzie Field Hangar expands your overall aircraft storage capabilities. If you own a Smuggler Hangar (30% off this week at Maze Bank Foreclosures), you’ll get an additional 15 slots at your Smuggler Hangar, plus a menu to request your Personal Aircraft and take off straight from the McKenzie Field Hangar runway. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/7a65dd3a236699555f2f455d02938ba2e0f77e12.jpg RETURN TRIP It’s hard to stay retired in Southern San Andreas. Oscar Guzman’s been plotting a triumphant return to the smuggling scene, and he’s looking for a partner to haul intercepted gang shipments of ammunition and arms. Unfortunately, Eberhard Munitions — the latest conglomerate making moves — has caught wind of Oscar’s scheme and decided to protect their investments with explosive force. Eberhard’s equipment will be protected by armed guards and backed up by significant air support, so Oscar will need all the help he can get. This latest explosive update to GTA Online will take you from the top of Mount Gordo to the bottom of the ocean as you fight cougars, steal a Mogul or two, hack Eberhard servers using remote-controlled drones, evade heat-seeking missiles, and blow up a submarine while chasing down dangerous and valuable payloads. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/681c99c98e40618c3c5988b4561a7bee3bc93907.jpg BAGGAGE CLAIM Owning the McKenzie Field Hangar also lets you perform additional resupply runs in four new Arms Trafficking Missions. These operations — accessed using the laptop inside the McKenzie Field Office or by calling and requesting work from Oscar — will require you to swipe deliveries from Oscar’s rival smugglers and drop them off safely to clients. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/071b3bc73ae9de134580c8aab763d450f9599aed.jpg NEW VEHICLES Today’s update also introduces several new vehicles to GTA Online, including options for taking the road and the sky by storm. Invetero is introducing a versatile new Coquette model to its fleet: the D5. This sports car has a V8 engine, sleek silhouette, and Missile Lock-On Jammer compatibility. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/f5fcec1af9697daf953717fe78aee6983774b80c.jpg Your accomplices can guard you from attack using the various weapons aboard the formidable new Titan 250 D, while the Buckingham DH-7 Iron Mule can be upgraded with Smoke and Flares to keep it safe as you exfiltrate cargo using its hook. Check out these aircraft on the Warstock Cache & Carry website, or head over to Elitás Travel to purchase the new Western Duster 300-H, a timeless propellor plane with optional machine guns to boot. Completing Arms Trafficking Missions and helping Oscar will also unlock Trade Prices for these aircraft, as well as unlocking a free Western Duster 300-H to use from the McKenzie Field Hangar. You can also now unlock the Trade Price for the Vapid Ratel (Off-Road) by completing the Ratel Run Arms Trafficking Mission. AND MORE TO COME… Look for more action coming down the runway in the months ahead, including a smoked-out version of Hunting Pack coming just in time for 4/20, exciting Community Challenges, and holiday celebrations. Today also includes a free upgrade for GTAV and GTA Online on PC that introduces highly sought-after features from the PS5 and Xbox Series X|S versions, including new vehicles and performance upgrades, and much more. title: Pre-Load the Free Grand Theft Auto V PC Upgrade Now
contents: The upcoming upgrade for Grand Theft Auto V on PC is now available to pre-load. This new version — with highly requested features previously only available in the PS5 and Xbox Series X|S versions including new vehicles and performance upgrades, access to subscribe to GTA+, and much more — arrives on March 4 and is available for free to all players who currently own GTAV on PC. Anyone who already owns GTAV will see GTAV Enhanced available in their library to begin pre-loading. The existing version for PC has been renamed GTAV Legacy — which will continue to be supported. Beginning today, you can also preemptively migrate your Story Mode progress to the new version, directly from the Pause Menu inside GTAV Legacy on PC. Please note, you can update the Story Mode Save Game uploaded to Rockstar Games multiple times — overwriting the previously uploaded Save Game each time — but you can only migrate it to GTAV Enhanced once, and while you will be able to continue playing from where you left off in GTAV Legacy, progress cannot be copied back. On March 4, once the free upgrade is available, you'll be able to migrate your Story Mode progress and GTA Online character progress from within GTAV Enhanced. The GTA Online transfer is also a one-time migration that does not delete your GTAV Legacy progress, but it cannot be reversed, and includes any Characters, GTA$, Progression, Stats, Vehicles, Properties, Weapons, Clothing, and Player-Created Jobs. Players on PlayStation 4 or Xbox One can still only migrate Story Mode and Online progress to PlayStation 5 or Xbox Series X|S. Profiles cannot be migrated between PlayStation or Xbox console families and PC. For more info on this free GTAV PC upgrade, including technical enhancement details and recommended specs, please check out our previous announcement.

Slide your way to victory around three new Drift Races in GTA Online: Go with the Flow — Give the denizens of Paleto Bay something legitimate to complain about by turning this quiet suburb into a hive of automotive activity. Gang’s All Here — Fishtail in the ganglands of Rancho and avoid becoming a road-rage statistic. Buckle Down — This track stretches from the Galileo Observatory to Downtown Vinewood. Whatever vehicular chaos is unleashed between Point A and Point B is entirely up to you. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/2429728f1f39f155f8e514fb78ebdd9c8659fe6f.jpg DRIFT UPGRADES FOR THREE VEHICLES AND DOUBLE REWARDS The Drift Tuning Upgrade is now available for three new vehicles at the LS Car Meet: the Dinka Jester Classic (Sports), Karin Futo (Sports), and RUNE Cheburek (Sports Classic, 30% off). Maintain control around corners, avoid collisions and obstacles, and rack up huge combos en route to Drift deity status in Drift Races to earn 2X GTA$ and RP this week. Slide into the action by speaking to the Race Organizer at the LS Car meet, or via your iFruit with an eligible LS Car Meet Membership. Participate in any three Drift Races to complete the new Weekly Challenge and earn a GTA$100,000 prize purse. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire

title: Get Double GTA$ and RP on Drag Races and 2X GTA$ on Auto Shop Client Jobs
contents: Time your upshifts precisely, avoid high-speed collisions, and power to victory in Drag Races, dishing out 2X GTA$ and RP this week — on top of the recently boosted payouts for these races as part of GTA Online: Agents of Sabotage. To sweeten the pot even further, participating in any two Drag Races will complete the Weekly Challenge and earn you an extra GTA$100,000. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/d44dc955dbf602b2620332bb4a5fb0716aef23e2.jpg 3X LS CAR MEET REPUTATION At the LS Car Meet, your net worth means little without the street cred to back it up. Make a name for yourself with Tripled Reputation for all eligible LS Car Meet activities, including the aforementioned Drag Races, through February 5. In addition to GTA$ bonuses awarded each time you level up, earning LS Car Meet Reputation unlocks a vast collection of racing-themed rewards, including clothing in the mod shop, special liveries, vehicle Trade Price discounts, wheels, and more. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: GTA 6's map is being re-created as a GTA 5 mod that Rockstar may or may not make some phone calls about
contents: We might not have gotten another one as of writing, but Vice City looked pretty amazing in GTA 6's first trailer, right? Well, one GTA community member thought so to such an extent that they're currently busy re-creating what we've seen of the map so far in GTA 5, as a mod that Rockstar will hopefully be cool with. Read more

title: Celebrate Lunar New Year in GTA Online
contents: Kick off the Year of the Snake with a Nitrous-infused bang across three brand-new Lunar New Year Stunt Races, complete with exploding fireworks, cascading lanterns, and a serious test of skill. This year’s Lunar New Year festivities in GTA Online also include special themed gifts, new Yuanbao Collectibles, Nightclub bonuses and more — full details below. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/e2192afdd8f6747b002a2e6b3d222c1cdc2f3c5d.jpg LUNAR NEW YEAR STUNT RACES Join up to 15 other players as you use Nitrous to speed through checkpoints and whip around winding racetracks while fireworks and paper lanterns fill the skies above Los Santos in new Lunar New Year themed Stunt Races. Participate in any of the new races by heading to the Featured Series in Legion Square and rack up 2X GTA$ and RP, while also scoring a limited-time Lunar New Year livery for the Maibatsu Penumbra FF (Sports, 30% off) through February 12, delivered within 72 hours of completion. NEW YUANBAO COLLECTIBLES Invite prosperity into your life for the year ahead by searching for new Yuanbao Collectibles hidden around Los Santos. Each one found awards GTA$ and RP, with a special bonus for collecting all 36. If you’re looking for some roadside assistance to locate these across Southern San Andreas, upgrade your Benefactor Terrorbyte at the Garment Factory with the new Collectible Scanner from Agents of Sabotage. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire

title: As a longtime GTA roleplayer, this documentary about actors putting on Hamlet inside GTA Online made me laugh, cry, and wholeheartedly regret ever calling Shakespeare a boring old bastard
contents: Grand Theft Hamlet is a masterpiece. On one hand, the in-game feature documentary that culminates in an unexpectedly moving rendition of one of literature's most acclaimed tragedies perfectly captures the boundless possibilities of videogames. Simply by giving inventive players the tools to create and perform, we're shown how even William Shakespeare can be led to the heart of Los Santos... Read more.

title: Infiltrate Fort Zancudo in The Brute Force File
contents: Set your sights on the hangar below Fort Zancudo in The Brute Force File — where you’ll suit up and sneak into the notorious military base, then make a break for it behind the controls of a Scarab tank. The weekly Priority File offers an increased GTA$ payout, and all FIB Files from GTA Online: Agents of Sabotage feature optional mission challenges that award bonus GTA$ and Career Progress rewards. On top of the heftier payday from this week’s Priority File, finishing any three FIB Files will complete the new Weekly Challenge and result in a GTA$100,000 bonus. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/6144970/af4566867ff35c2150f1f8801a5476444eb87914.jpg GET THE MERRYWEATHER HOODIE Sneaking onto a Merryweather barge and stealing their Tula plane is a key objective in The Black Box File. Successfully completing this FIB File assignment will also land you the Merryweather Hoodie as a bonus this week — all rewards will be delivered within 72 hours of completion. See full event details at the Rockstar Newswire.

title: Massive GTA 5 Liberty City modding project bites the dust after "friendly takedown" chat with Rockstar, dev says there's "no negativity" between it and Take-Two
contents: A massive modding project which had brought a full re-creation of GTA 4's Liberty City to GTA 5 has gone the way of most pedestrians who cross a street Michael, Franklin, or Trevor happen to driving down. After a conversation with Rockstar Games, which the mod's developers have stated wasn't "a DMCA, rather a friendly takedown", it's been pulled from the internet. Read more

title: GTA 5 mod recreating GTA 4's map nuked after 6 years of work because people noticed, and Rockstar insisted on a 'friendly takedown', if you know what I mean
contents: The GTA 5 Liberty City Preservation Project (LCPP) was released this month after six years of work, recreating GTA 4's unforgettable Liberty City within GTA 5's game world. This was a seriously impressive piece of work, managing to bring over the entirety of Rockstar's skewed New York and show it all off with GTA 5's improved visuals and audio: It even arrived with Steam Deck compatibility... Read more.

title: Huge GTA 5 Liberty City mod allegedly shut down by Rockstar
contents: A huge modding project within Grand Theft Auto 5 has allegedly been shut down after discussions with Rockstar. According to a post from a member of the mod's team, the decision to end the Liberty City Preservation Project was made following an apparent meeting with the developer and publisher.
